title: Millionaire candidates make massive ad buys in Pennsylvania's GOP Senate primary

title: Ex-hedge fund CEO aims to be hometown boy in key Senate race

title: Ex-hedge fund CEO aims to be hometown boy in key Senate race

author: Associated Press
title: Ex-hedge fund CEO aims to be hometown boy in Senate race in Pennsylvania

sentence: Compared to Lamb, the sort of ur-centrist Dem perfectly suited to sit comfortably in the middle of the road until he’s flattened by a semi, John Fetterman has stomped unapologetically onto the political scene as a legal weed-loving, union-boosting everyman who eschews suits and ties for shorts and hoodies.
title: Pennsylvania is ground zero for 2022’s ugliest Senate races

author: Ashley Oliver
title: Poll: McCormick and Oz in Dead Heat in Pennsylvania Senate Primary

author: Patrick Reilly
title: Trump gives Dr. Oz ‘complete and total endorsement’ in wide-open PA Senate race

author: Grayson Quay
title: Trump endorses Dr. Oz for Senate

sentence: Mr Schlichter was more succinct in his rejection of the TV doctor: “Endorsing Dr Oz is like arguing that Limp Bizkit is the greatest band ever.” Pennsylvania’s Senate primary will be held on 17 May; Republicans battling over the nomination will likely face either Lieutenant Gov John Fetterman or Rep Conor Lamb, the two leading candidates in the state’s Democratic primary, in November.
author: John Bowden
title: Trump allies claim he was ‘played’ after endorsing TV’s Dr Oz for Senate seat

author: Jon Skolnik
title: Trump fans angered by his endorsement of Dr. Oz

author: Paul Blest
title: Trump Endorsed Dr. Oz and Republicans Are Pissed

sentence: Conor Lamb is attacking his party's frontrunner, John Fetterman, for seeking the endorsement of a "democratic socialist" and being a "silver spooned socialist."
author: Wendy Daughenbaugh
title: How former President Donald Trump is impacting the Senate race, PA Primary
